ReadingPractice: Task 2. Answer the following questions. 1. What is the area of the rainforest in Cuc Phuong National Park? 2. Why would November be a suitable time to visit this park? 3. What can people learn in Nairobi National Park? 4. What kinds of animals are taken care of in the Orphanage? 5. Why is Everglades National Park endangered? 6. What do you think will happen to Everglades National Park if more chemicals are released into the water?
